metadata.name: The station
metadata.description:
Eleven years have passed since the Great East Japan Earthquake which had decimated my city and took the lives of 18,000 citizens. 
At that time I did not have a proper camera and I couldnâ€™t find my memory card which had fell during the chaos; I have very few photos to share, this is one of them.

A portion of the proceeds from the sales will be donated to support children who were orphaned after the earthquake.
